name: ipv-cri-bav-front
description: Frontend for the identify proving and bank account verification CRI

scripts.build: yarn build-sass && yarn build-js && yarn copy-assets
scripts.build-sass: rm -rf dist/public/style.css && sass --no-source-map src/assets/scss/application.scss dist/public/stylesheets/application.css --style compressed
scripts.build-js:all: mkdir -p dist/public/javascripts; uglifyjs node_modules/govuk-frontend/govuk/all.js node_modules/hmpo-components/all.js --beautify -o dist/public/javascripts/all.js
scripts.test:browser: wait-on tcp:127.0.0.1:8090 tcp:127.0.0.1:5040 && cucumber-js test/browser/features/**/*.feature --require test/browser/support/env.js  --require test/browser/support/setup.js --require test/browser/step_definitions/**/*.js -f json:./test/reports/cucumber_report.json --tags @success
scripts.test:browser:ci: npm-run-all -p -r start:ci mocks test:browser && npm run test:browser:report
scripts.test:e2e:cd:cucumber: wait-on tcp:8090 && cucumber-js test/browser/features/**/*.feature --require test/browser/support/env.js  --require test/browser/support/setup.js --require test/browser/step_definitions/**/*.js -f json:./test/reports/cucumber_report.json --tags "@e2e or @success"
scripts.test:e2e:cd: npm-run-all -p -r mocks test:e2e:cd:cucumber && yarn run test:browser:report
